channel.title: Blazescape Reborn-by Cocoa && LilxCj
channel.description:
BlazeScape's Source, released.
Base Source: iClarity v1.05 [b]Packaged:[/b] Yes
[u]Features[/u] - Custom Train Area in Slayer Tower and Crandor - Custom PK area in Fight Arena - Custom Skilling Area - Custom Woodcutting Guild - Castle Wars Starting Area - 60-75% Castle Wars - Working Duel Arena - Working Cooking (Burn formula needs some rework) - Working Fishing (Fish timers needs rework) - Working Fletching - Working Flax Spinning - Working Mining - Smithing Base (incomplete skill) - Working Woodcutting - Working Firemaking (Note: If you want no-clipping, you will have to do it yourself.) - Crafting Base - Working Runecrafting (With Multi-runes) - Working Barrows - Working Herblore - Working Slayer - Custom Warriors Guild Map - Custom Godwars Map - Actual Godwars Map - Actual Warriors Guild Map - Custom items include dylan's Greatswords, Arcanians weapon set, and more! - Updated Dharok's axe and abyssal whip models - Godswords and Godsword stance - Giant mole area - Magic Scrolls open up bank! - Potions - PvP - PvN - More that I can't think of.
[u]Media[/u] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/166cboi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/rupifk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/f3z252.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/10yf0iw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/28o07p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/335h280.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rep3iu.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2v9t28i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2s61qf7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/jfu6c5.jpg[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/t04184.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/124iwi8.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ivd8o4.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/33bhjd1.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/v43whh.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/wrnoma.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/ndlf6s.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/213en9e.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ywff5z.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/efm3ch.png[/img]
[u]Commands[/u] Player: ::help ::players ::yell
Mod: ::empty ::bank ::banuser [username] ::mute [username] ::anal [username] ::tele [x coord] [y coord] ::xteleto [username] ::teletome [username]
Admin+: ::item [itemid] [amount] ::interface [interfaceid] ::frame126 [sendquestId/frame126Id] ::frame246 [frame246Id] ::lights ::ipban [username] ::unmute [username] ::abort [username] ::testingface [dialogueEmoteid] ::wall [face] ::door [face] ::xteleall ::xtelestaff ::height [level]
[b][Links][/b] [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/downloads/224045-blazescape-client.html]Client[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?mxgyznftjuy]Source[/url] [hr]
Credits: Me 50% Corey/Ituharu/LilXCj 50%
Enjoy

item.title: Blazescape Reborn-by Cocoa && LilxCj
item.dc:creator: @XxLeg1txX XxLeg1txX
item.description:
@XxLeg1txX wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:1, topic:313884”]BlazeScape’s Source, released.

Base Source: iClarity v1.05
Packaged: Yes

Features

Client DL is Not Working. Please Replace!!

  • Custom Train Area in Slayer Tower and Crandor
  • Custom PK area in Fight Arena
  • Custom Skilling Area
  • Custom Woodcutting Guild
  • Castle Wars Starting Area
  • 60-75% Castle Wars
  • Working Duel Arena
  • Working Cooking (Burn formula needs some rework)
  • Working Fishing (Fish timers needs rework)
  • Working Fletching
  • Working Flax Spinning
  • Working Mining
  • Smithing Base (incomplete skill)
  • Working Woodcutting
  • Working Firemaking (Note: If you want no-clipping, you will have to do it yourself.)
  • Crafting Base
  • Working Runecrafting (With Multi-runes)
  • Working Barrows
  • Working Herblore
  • Working Slayer
  • Custom Warriors Guild Map
  • Custom Godwars Map
  • Actual Godwars Map
  • Actual Warriors Guild Map
  • Custom items include dylan’s Greatswords, Arcanians weapon set, and more!
  • Updated Dharok’s axe and abyssal whip models
  • Godswords and Godsword stance
  • Giant mole area
  • Magic Scrolls open up bank!
  • Potions
  • PvP
  • PvN
  • More that I can’t think of.

Media



















Commands
Player:
::help
::players
::yell

Mod:
::empty
::bank
::banuser [username]
::mute [username]
::anal [username]
::tele [x coord] [y coord]
::xteleto [username]
::teletome [username]

Admin+:
::item [itemid] [amount]
::interface [interfaceid]
::frame126 [sendquestId/frame126Id]
::frame246 [frame246Id]
::lights
::ipban [username]
::unmute [username]
::abort [username]
::testingface [dialogueEmoteid]
::wall [face]
::door [face]
::xteleall
::xtelestaff
::height [level]

[Links]
Client
Source
[hr]

Credits:
Me 50%
Corey/Ituharu/LilXCj 50%

Enjoy[/quote]

Read full topic
